# Legislation links

Here are some of my preferred sites.

General advice: <https://legislativelibrary.ny.gov/legislative-resources>

Current law: <https://codes.findlaw.com/>

Different vintages of statutes (i.e., as they stood at different points in time): <https://www.nysenate.gov/legislation>

Chapters, bills, etc.: <http://public.leginfo.state.ny.us/navigate.cgi>

## Laws of New York

-   [Senate site](https://www.nysenate.gov/legislation/laws/CONSOLIDATED) -- **good for tracing legislative history of laws**

    -   Caution: pay attention to the dropdown box below "SEE MOST RECENT VERSION BEFORE OR ON:"; usually you will want to choose the latest date. This dropdown is useful for tracing the legislative history of a section of law.

    -   [State Finance Law](https://www.nysenate.gov/legislation/laws/STF)

    -   [Tax Law](https://www.nysenate.gov/legislation/laws/TAX)

-   [Assembly site](https://nyassembly.gov/leg/)
